languages.text: "Куда интереснее, как теперь будут собирать и защищать десятину. Кажется, священная подать станет более легкой добычей... Для пиратов и врагов Империума, разумеется!"

traits.locale_text: "Куда интереснее, как теперь будут собирать и защищать десятину. Кажется, священная подать станет более легкой добычей... Для пиратов и врагов Империума, разумеется!"

languages.text: "The more interesting question is, who is going to collect and guard the tithe now? It seems the sacred tribute is about to become a much easier target... for pirates and other enemies of the Imperium, of course!"
languages.original_text: "Куда интереснее, как теперь будут собирать и защищать десятину. Кажется, священная подать станет более легкой добычей... Для пиратов и врагов Империума, разумеется!"

"The more interesting question is, who is going to collect and guard the tithe now? It seems the sacred tribute is about to become a much easier target... for pirates and other enemies of the Imperium, of course!"

languages.text: 「もっと興味深いのは、これから誰が租税を集め、それを守るのかということよ。どうやらこの神聖なる貢ぎ物は、ずっと狙いやすい標的になりそうね…もちろん、海賊や帝国の敵どもにとっては、だけど！」
languages.original_text: "The more interesting question is, who is going to collect and guard the tithe now? It seems the sacred tribute is about to become a much easier target... for pirates and other enemies of the Imperium, of course!"

traits.locale_text: 「もっと興味深いのは、これから誰が租税を集め、それを守るのかということよ。どうやらこの神聖なる貢ぎ物は、ずっと狙いやすい標的になりそうね…もちろん、海賊や帝国の敵どもにとっては、だけど！」

languages.text: "Die interessantere Frage ist: Wer soll nun den Zehnt eintreiben und bewachen? Der heilige Tribut wird nun wohl zu einem sehr viel leichteren Ziel ... für Piraten und andere Feinde des Imperiums, versteht sich!"
languages.original_text: "The more interesting question is, who is going to collect and guard the tithe now? It seems the sacred tribute is about to become a much easier target... for pirates and other enemies of the Imperium, of course!"

traits.locale_text: "Die interessantere Frage ist: Wer soll nun den Zehnt eintreiben und bewachen? Der heilige Tribut wird nun wohl zu einem sehr viel leichteren Ziel ... für Piraten und andere Feinde des Imperiums, versteht sich!"

languages.text: « Personnellement, je me pose une question bien plus intéressante : qui va prélever et garder la dîme, maintenant ? Le tribut sacré risque de devenir une cible bien plus facile... pour les pirates et les autres ennemis de l'Imperium, évidemment ! »
languages.original_text: "The more interesting question is, who is going to collect and guard the tithe now? It seems the sacred tribute is about to become a much easier target... for pirates and other enemies of the Imperium, of course!"

traits.locale_text: « Personnellement, je me pose une question bien plus intéressante : qui va prélever et garder la dîme, maintenant ? Le tribut sacré risque de devenir une cible bien plus facile... pour les pirates et les autres ennemis de l'Imperium, évidemment ! »

languages.text: «La pregunta más interesante es, ¿quién va a recaudar y custodiar ahora el diezmo? Parece que el tributo sagrado va a convertirse en un blanco mucho más apetecible... ¡para los piratas y demás enemigos del Imperium, quiero decir!».
languages.original_text: "The more interesting question is, who is going to collect and guard the tithe now? It seems the sacred tribute is about to become a much easier target... for pirates and other enemies of the Imperium, of course!"

traits.locale_text: «La pregunta más interesante es, ¿quién va a recaudar y custodiar ahora el diezmo? Parece que el tributo sagrado va a convertirse en un blanco mucho más apetecible... ¡para los piratas y demás enemigos del Imperium, quiero decir!».

languages.text: “而更有趣的问题是，如今应该由谁负责收取、看守什一税呢？在这种情况下，夺取神圣什一税会变得简单很多……我是说，当然啦，只有海盗和帝国的敌人才会这么做！”
languages.original_text: "The more interesting question is, who is going to collect and guard the tithe now? It seems the sacred tribute is about to become a much easier target... for pirates and other enemies of the Imperium, of course!"

traits.locale_text: “而更有趣的问题是，如今应该由谁负责收取、看守什一税呢？在这种情况下，夺取神圣什一税会变得简单很多……我是说，当然啦，只有海盗和帝国的敌人才会这么做！”

languages.text: "Daha da önemlisi, bundan sonra toplanacak aşarlardan kim sorumlu olacak? Kutsal aşarın korsanlar ve İmparatorluk'un diğer düşmanları için açık hedef hâline gelmesi an meselesi."
languages.original_text: "The more interesting question is, who is going to collect and guard the tithe now? It seems the sacred tribute is about to become a much easier target... for pirates and other enemies of the Imperium, of course!"
